Uses of Class
fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth.AuthnException

  • Packages that use AuthnException 
    Package Description
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth
    Services for authentication and authorization, and accessing user directories.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector
    Services for communicating with OpenAGE servers (and potentially other data stores).

    • Uses of AuthnException in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth

      Subclasses of AuthnException in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TicketExpiryException
      Thrown when an attempt is made to use an expired authentication ticket.
      class  TicketTokenException
      Thrown when an attempt is made to use an invalid authentication ticket token.

    • Uses of AuthnException in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector

      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.connector that throw AuthnException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITicket IPlatformAuthnService.authenticateWithTrust(IUser user)
      Authenticates an OpenAGE user, with a configured secret key shared with the OpenAGE platform server.
      ITicket IPlatformAuthnService.authenticateWithTrust(String userPrincipal)
      Authenticates an OpenAGE user, with a configured secret key shared with the OpenAGE platform server.
      String IPlatformAuthnService.getPlatformAuthnToken(ITicket ticket)
      Gets a single-use token, enabling a client (already authenticated for the current application) to authenticate automatically with the OpenAGE platform server that provided the ticket.
